title: Language Learning Project Design Utilizing Real-Time Learner Analytics Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Real-time learner monitoring using interface-adaptive visualization tools in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can establish self-directed learning strategies using real-time analytics tools in language learning projects.
Learners can interpret peer learners' engagement levels with over 80% accuracy through interface variation visualizations (e.g., icon color/size changes).
Learners can improve learning objects (e.g., vocabulary quizzes, pronunciation assessments) at least twice based on feedback from analytical tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
